channel.title: FLF - The Rebel Podcast
channel.description: FIGHT LAUGH FEAST PRESENTS SHOWS PROCLAIMING THE LORDSHIP OF CHRIST OVER ALL OF LIFE.
channel.itunes:author: FLF, LLC

item.title: The Alistair Begg Controversy And The Moscow Mood [The Rebel Podcast]
item.description: Everybody's heard about Alistair Begg's advice to a grandmother about attending her grandkid's trans gay wedding.  Many have responded, and some people say that some of the responses have been harsh.  The Rebels weigh in on this issue today - not so much the Begg advice issue itself, rather the criticism of harshness.  What would Jesus say?!
item.author: Pastors Nate & Chris - The Rebels
item.itunes:author: Pastors Nate & Chris - The Rebels

item.title: The Great 2023 Book Reading Challenge Big Winner Reveal! [The Rebel Podcast]
item.description: It's finally here!  The big reveal; who won the Great 2023 Book Reading Challenge?  The benchmark was 100 books.  You'll need to listen to hear the results, but I can tell you it wasn't me, tech guy Dave.  I thought it was 100 pages!  But seriously, everybody needs to be reading good books.  You say you are not a book reader?  Well, fair or not, the guys say that audio books count to, so grab those ear buds and listen while you work.
item.author: Pastors Nate & Chris & Jordan
item.itunes:author: Pastors Nate & Chris & Jordan
